name: • All site personnel inducted (includes environment and cultural)
• Required Safe Work Method Statements completed and signed
• Installation of soil erosion and sedimentation controls completed in accordance with Soil and Water Specs.
• Air quality to be visually monitored for dust etc. as a direct result of construction activities.
• HOLD POINT: Submit details of sign manufacturer, materials and attachment system 2 weeks before fabrication (HP)
• HOLD POINT: One week before ordering, submit evidence that sign materials and parts conform to this worksection (HP)
• HOLD POINT: One week before ordering, submit details of materials and evidence that materials for background and legend are compatible
• HOLD POINT: One week before ordering, submit evidence that sign supports conform to this worksection
• HOLD POINT: One week before ordering, submit evidence that steel reinforcement conform to this worksection
• HOLD POINT: Fabricated purpose-designed sign structures
• HOLD POINT: Locate and protect services from damage 1 week before placing footings and erecting signs
• WITNESS POINT: Notice of inspection of clearing 1 day after clearing
• HOLD POINT: Notice of inspection of sign support structure set-out 1 week before sign erection
• WITNESS POINT: Notice of inspection of completed excavation for footings 1 day before placing footings
• WITNESS POINT: Notice of inspection of footings for steel reinforcement
• WITNESS POINT: Notice of inspection of adjusted, relocated or replaced signs
QA ENGINEER / SPE / PE SIGN OFF
